marketinginformation: the Axis 210 Network Camera Offers A Cost-effective, Ip-based Solution For Professional Indoor Security Surveillance And Remote Monitoring. It Delivers Superior Image Quality Using Progressive Scan And Provides Built-in Motion Detection And Support For Advanced Event Management.
